categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Toby Hefferman is a first assistant director and actor who worked as the first assistant director for Rogue One: A Star Wars Story and Solo: A Star Wars Story. He also portrayed Lieutenant Heff Tobber in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.

On October 14, 2017, it was announced that Toby Hefferman and screenwriter Jon Kasdan would portray Bink and Tag, two characters that first appeared in the Star Wars comics published by Dark Horse Comics.
